headline.main: Deputies Shoot, Kill Man After Answering Woman's 911 Call
headline.print_headline: Deputies Shoot, Kill Man After Answering Woman's 911 Call

lead_paragraph: Authorities in South Carolina say deputies answering a 911 call have shot and killed a man who pointed a gun at them.
snippet: Authorities in South Carolina say deputies answering a 911 call have shot and killed a man who pointed a gun at them....
